title: Update Emergency Action Plan
description: Due to new construction nearby, the primary evacuation route has changed. The safety manager must update the project's Emergency Action Plan (EAP).

tasks.description: Retrieve the current Emergency Action Plan document.
Update the evacuation map in the EAP to show the new primary route and muster point.
tasks.expected_outcome: The map is updated with the correct information.

tasks.description: Distribute the revised EAP to all site personnel and post the new maps.
tasks.expected_outcome: The updated plan is communicated to everyone on site.
